entry.title: Telepathically, you know a lot more than you’re letting on…
entry.summary: Whenever I see a flock of birds moving and changing direction in perfect unison, it reminds me of the magical nature of telepathy. Telepathy is often present in the nature of every day things although it is sometimes not recognized as such. Even within
